MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Lomond Walk and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:55pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network on Broom Park and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:13pm on Tuesday, 27 October 2020
